audioText: Le parti majoritaire renoue avec l'opposition, mais pas avec ses anciens alliés : « Les modérés sont revenus à la maison, mais tout n'est pas oublié. C'est à cause d'eux que l'assemblée a pu adopter les pires réformes depuis des années »
question: What is the relationship between the majority party and its former allies?
options: The majority party and former allies are working together in opposition
The majority party joins opposition but refuses cooperation with former allies
Former allies have convinced the majority party to abandon opposition
Both groups oppose any opposition stance
explanation: The text states 'Le parti majoritaire renoue avec l'opposition, mais pas avec ses anciens alliés' - The majority party reconnects with opposition, but not with its former allies. The quote suggests moderates have 'returned home' (to opposition politics) but haven't forgiven their former allies' role in allowing 'the worst reforms in years' to pass.
